EmailTemplate.description: FTTA. Created for the email notification to Lab Contact that OGC concurs on Agreement.
EmailTemplate.name: Email notification to Lab Contact- At Signature Using HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.EPA_File_2__c} - At Signature
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!EPA_Agreement__c.Lab_Contact__c},
OGC concurs on EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.EPA_File_2__c} with {!EPA_Agreement__c.Partner_Name__c}. Once you have a fully executed agreement/amendment, upload the final PDF version and click on the Signed button. Please email FTTA@epa.gov with any questions..
To access the agreement/amendment, please click the below link.
{!EPA_Agreement__c.EPA_File_2__c}.
Thank you.
